last_episode_to_air.name: The Debate
last_episode_to_air.overview: Arpi and Neil square off in the televised mayoral recall debate; James reveals information that may change the course of his and Mikaela's relationship.

name: Mr. Mayor
overview: A retired businessman runs for mayor of Los Angeles to prove he's "still got it." Once he wins, he has to figure out what he stands for, gain the respect of his biggest critic and connect with his teenage daughter, all while trying to get anything right for America's second weirdest city.
tagline: Welcome to L.A.â€¦ where dreams sometimes come true!

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Neil Bremer starts his first day as mayor of Los Angeles, where he faces new challenges on the job and at home.

episodes.name: Mayor's Day Out
episodes.overview: After visiting a marijuana dispensary in support of his legalization plan, things go awry for Mayor Neil Bremer. While out, he puts Mikaela in charge of the mayor's office for the day.

episodes.name: Brentwood Trash
episodes.overview: Jayden interviews candidates for an opening on the team. Neil gets sidetracked during a town hall, and Orly has a shocking realization.

episodes.name: The Sac
episodes.overview: A special assignment forces Jayden and Arpi to get to know each other. Meanwhile, Neil sets out on a mission to reconnect with Orly after she gets into a little trouble.

episodes.name: Dodger Day
episodes.overview: Mayor Neil rolls out a new safety initiative as Arpi trains him for his most challenging task yet. Mikaela and Tommy realize the clock is ticking for them to find love.

episodes.name: Respect in the Workplace
episodes.overview: A mandatory staff meeting derails plans for the teamâ€™s favorite day of the month.

episodes.name: Avocado Crisis
episodes.overview: An avocado shortage brings the city of L.A. to its knees and an exhausted Mikaela discovers the only thing that can put her to sleep is one of Arpi's boring presentations.

episodes.name: Hearts Before Parts
episodes.overview: Neil tries to convince Orly that a casual fling is more serious than it is and a trivia competition threatens to tear the staff apart.

episodes.name: #Palmtreereform
episodes.overview: Neil's plan to save the city money on palm tree maintenance meets unexpected resistance. Tommy and Mikaela don't believe Jayden when he announces he's going to be a father.

episodes.name: Move Fast and Break Things
episodes.overview: Neil is excited to work with his new Innovation Team but gets sidetracked when he has to take Orly (and Arpi) to the DMV for her permit test. Tommy and Mikaela become increasingly concerned about the I-Teamâ€™s new presence and fight to keep Jayden off the chopping block.

episodes.name: Mayor Daddy
episodes.overview: Mikaela learns that her award for flattening the homelessness curve is based on a lie, and, with James and Arpi's help, grows determined to make a change for real. Neil realizes that his excitement about the I-Team has caused his original staff to act out like children, so he attempts to appease them.

episodes.name: Trampage
episodes.overview: In the midst of a heat wave, Neil has a fling with Angelica, a prominent commercial actress. Tommy accidentally ruins the joy of Arpi's scratch-off lottery habit, but helps her by revealing a secret hobby of his own.

episodes.name: The Illusion of Choice
episodes.overview: Mikaela and Tommy help Jayden transform into a Scorpio after he learns that his dream apartment has astrological sign requirements. Neil's attempt to raise mayoral awareness takes a turn when James nudges him to put his face on trash cans all over the city.

episodes.name: Sister Cities
episodes.overview: Neil can't wait to show off his deal-making skills with the visiting mayors of L.A.'s sister cities, but chaos ensues when he mistakes a group of film extras for the real mayors. Mikaela, with Arpi's encouragement, decides to finally ask out James.

episodes.name: Venus on the Moon
episodes.overview: Neil is forced to burst Orly's bubble about her "perfect mother." Arpi uses the office's high school interns to help get a bill passed. A freshly rejected Mikaela tries to prove that she has plenty of time in her life for things besides work.

episodes.name: Murder in the Old West
episodes.overview: Jayden hosts a Western-themed murder mystery party where Mikaela tries to figure out what's going on between her and James. Arpi and Neil clash over how to spend the city's newly acquired budget surplus.

episodes.name: Titi B.
episodes.overview: Neil accidentally angers mega-influencer Titi B. and must apologize or deal with the wrath of her followers. Jayden coaches Arpi on how to be less abrasive at personal appearances.

episodes.name: The Recall
episodes.overview: Tensions rise as Titi B.â€™s petition to recall Mayor Bremer gains traction. Jayden panics over having to side with Arpi against Neil. Mikaela and Jamesâ€™ first kiss leaves something to be desired.

episodes.name: The Debate
episodes.overview: Arpi and Neil square off in the televised mayoral recall debate; James reveals information that may change the course of his and Mikaela's relationship.
